description:
Co-crafted with professional guides, athletes, and backcountry enthusiasts, the Sopris 30 is your ultimate ski companion. It offers ample storage, lightweight features for easy climbs, all while ensuring a stable fit for thrilling descents. Plus, it incorporates eco-friendly construction with bluesign® approved materials and PFAS-free DWR treatments.

  • Made of high-tenacity 210-denier nylon with a PFC-free DWR finish for weather resistance
  • Thermoformed, contoured EVA foam back panel and shoulder straps shed snow
  • Lightweight design is highly adjustable for dynamic movement in mountain environments
  • Padded hipbelt adjusts with a single pull
  • Large zipper pulls and buckles for use with gloves on
  • Easily access the main compartment via the rear access panel even with skis attached
  • Dedicated avi gear storage pocket with wide J-shaped zip accommodates large shovels
  • Lined goggle pocket and internal zippered pocket organize small items
  • Stowable helmet holder and ice tool loops ensure you're ready for more technical terrain
  • Main compartment with internal buckle lets you add your own reservoir (sold separately)
name: Osprey Sopris 30 Backpack - Women's
